title: Song of Durin (3U5)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. To play, exert a Dwarf. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each [Moria] weapon is +2. Fellowship: Discard this condition to discard up to 2 [Moria] conditions.
Lore:	“No harp is wrung, no hammer falls: / The darkness dwells in Durin's halls….”
Rarity:	U
